mapper.delete: delete g from `request_file_group` g left join `request_file` rf on g.`id` = rf.`group_id` where rf.`id` is null
mapper.sql: from `request_file_group` g left join `request_file` p on g.`id` = p.`group_id` and p.`type` = 'PAYMENT' left join `request_file` b on g.`id` = b.`group_id` and b.`type` = 'BENEFIT' left join `payment` on `payment`.`request_file_id` = p.`id`
mapper.select:
select g.id as gid, g.status as status, b.id as b_id, b.loaded as b_loaded, b.name as b_name, b.directory as b_directory, b.organization_id as b_organization_id, b.registry as b_registry, b.month as b_month, b.year as b_year, b.dbf_record_count as b_dbf_record_count, b.length as b_length, b.check_sum as b_check_sum, b.type as b_type, p.id as p_id, p.loaded as p_loaded, p.name as p_name, p.directory as p_directory, p.organization_id as p_organization_id, p.registry as p_registry, p.month as p_month, p.year as p_year, p.dbf_record_count as p_dbf_record_count, p.length as p_length, p.check_sum as p_check_sum, p.type as p_type, count(`payment`.`id`) as loaded_record_count, count(`payment`.`account_number`) as binded_record_count, count(IF(`payment`.`status` = 215, 1, NULL)) as filled_record_count
order by `status` order by p.`name` order by b.`name` order by loaded_record_count order by binded_record_count order by filled_record_count order by p.`${sortProperty}`
asc desc
limit #{first}, #{count}

select count(*) from (select g.`id`, count(`payment`.`id`) as loaded_record_count, count(`payment`.`account_number`) as binded_record_count, count(IF(`payment`.`status` = 215, 1, NULL)) as filled_record_count
) as q
